snippet: Dr. Hauri was one of the first researchers to study the mechanics of a good night’s sleep.
abstract: Peter Hauri, psychologist who was among the first researchers to study the mysterious mechanics of a good night’s sleep and who established widely used guidelines for avoiding insomnia without drugs, dies at age 79.
lead_paragraph: Dr. Hauri was one of the first researchers to study the mechanics of a good night’s sleep.

headline.seo: Peter Hauri, Psychologist Who Focused on Insomnia, Dies at 79
